name: Optimus Prime
description: Optimus Prime is the heroic leader of the Autobots. This transformer toy features impressive transformation abilities and comes with various weapons and accessories.

name: Megatron
description: Megatron is the powerful leader of the Decepticons. This transformer toy is known for its menacing appearance and includes additional attachments for enhanced playability.

name: Bumblebee
description: Bumblebee is a friendly and agile Autobot. This transformer toy is perfect for young fans and features a compact design with easy transformation.
